name: Crystal Rush (joelsgames)
description:
Title: Crystal Rush

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: 

Crystal Rush is a LEGO platformer game where the player has two win conditions they have to meet. They have to collect all crystals around the map, and they have to do so before time runs out. However, they also have to dodge projectiles from enemies while doing these two things. This game encapsulates the saying, "If you can dodge a wrench, you can dodge a ball!"

 Instructions: use WASD to move, space to jump/double jump, mouse to angle camera view, and tab to pause. The objective is to collect all crystals before time runs out.

 Game Design Team 

Joel Roth – Game Designer
